name: Get 'Em 2 The VOTE!
description:
Get the voters to the polls before time runs out! Navigate twenty-five different levels of fun, wacky props full of obstacles in order to achieve your ultimate goal: Get 'em to the VOTE!

Don't forget to go vote in real life as well, please share this game in order to remind everyone that voting is important - even if it is really, really frustrating sometimes.
